actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Spines or one Ram and one Spine.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d10+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Deadfall (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: If stick is 15 ft.+ off the ground can fall to the ground landing on its feet in a space it can see within 20' of it that contains 1+ other creatures. Each of them: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 13 Dex half not knocked prone and pushed 5 ft. out of stick's space into unoccupied space of creature's choice). Also each creature within 10 ft. of stick when it lands: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 13 Dex negates both).

bonus_actions.name: Startling Display
bonus_actions.desc: Each creature within 5 ft. of the stick: DC 13 Int save or be incapacitated until end of its next turn. The walking stick then flies up to its flying speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal forest vegetation. Ex: small tree large branch.

special_abilities.name: Forest Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in forested terrain.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight toward a creature and then hits it with Ram attack on same turn target: DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone stick can make one Spine attack vs. it as a bonus action.
